# Plots with ggplot2

We are going to make plots in R and it's going to be amazing.

```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(readr)
```

```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))


```
```{r echo=FALSE}
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors))

gg_base +
  geom_line(
    color = "purple",
    linetype = "dashed"
  )   # Line

gg_base +
  geom_point(color = "purple",
             pch = 17,
             size = 4,
             alpha = 0.5)  # scatterplot

gg_base +
  geom_col(color = "tan2",
           size = 1,
           alpha = 0.5
    
  )    # Column

gg_base +
  geom_area( color = "coral",
             size = 1,
             alpha = 0.5
    
  )    # Area

gg_base + 
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
        color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )

gg_base + 
  geom_col(aes(fill = visitors))
```
